title: Carmel - Collected + Good News@320
description:
1. Carmel - Collected (1990)


COLLECTED is a solid 13-track overview of the best material by 1980s British jazz-pop singer Carmel McCourt (and her trio),who kind of has a Sade thing going on.Big following in France. 
13 tracks including &#039;Sally&#039;,&#039;Bad Day&#039;,&#039;I&#039;m Not Afraid Of You&#039; and a cover of &#039;It&#039;s All In The Game&#039; which appeared on the soundtrack to &#039;She&#039;s Having A Baby&#039;.
The music is jazzy, gospel, funky.



01. And I Take It For Granted                                                                                           
02. Sally                                                                                                               
03. It&#039;s All In The Game                                                                                                
04. I&#039;m Not Afraid Of You                                                                                               
05. Every Little Bit                                                                                                    
06. I Have Fallen In Love                                                                                               
07. More More More                                                                                                      
08. You Can Have Him                                                                                                    
09. Bad Day                                                                                                             
10. J&#039;oublierai Ton Nom                                                                                                 
11. I&#039;m Over You                                                                                                        
12. One Fine Day                                                                                                        
13. If Birds Can Fly        




2. Carmel - Good News (1992)


Released after the &#039;Collected&#039;.Best songs the anti-war &#039;Good News&#039; and the
&#039;Letter To Margaret (Thatcher)&#039;



01. Java                                                                                                                
02. You&#039;re All I Need                                                                                                   
03. Heaven                                                                                                              
04. Angel                                                                                                               
05. Letter To Margaret                                                                                                  
06. You&#039;re On My Mind                                                                                                   
07. Circle Line
